articles.description:
Re UPDATE: Gemini Exchange went down due to an Amazon Web Service outage. They are working to bring the exchange back up...
Gemini: We experienced an Amazon Web Services EBS outage with one of our primary databases. We have restored the database and are bringing the exchange back up.
